raw_body: NITA CLARICE FERNANDO (SHIRLEY) – Beloved wife of Linton (decd.),​ beloved mother of Nishantha (CBA),​ mother-in-law of Kumudini,​ grandmother of Nadeesh and Sadathani (Australia) and Nimesh (Commercial Bank),​ sister of Herbert and Eric (decd.),​ called to Rest with Jesus. Funeral Service on Friday 14th July at residence at 3.30 p.m. and at Moratumulla Methodist Church at 4.30 p.m. Burial at Moratumulla Methodist Church Burial Ground. 31A,​ 2nd Lane,​ Kadalana,​ Moratuwa.042970
